channel.title: Art, Writing on GDLP
channel.description: Recent content in Art, Writing on GDLP

item.title: I have an image out with Photoworks ðŸ“¸
item.description: This is nice. Photoworks invited me to be on a panel for the 2024 annual summit about access in art festivals, but instead of getting loads of trains to Brighton or Zooming in, I asked if I could submit a photo. I’ve been taking lots of film photos over the past year and there was one on my mind, of the mold on my bathroom ceiling. After starting my Culture at Home column on Elephant, I thought it was funny to see that in terms of another kind of culture.
